text: Une fois les donn√©es charg√©es, il est n√©cessaire de les pr√©parer avant analyse. G√©n√©ralement, pour un essai en protection phytosanitaire, la fr√©quence et l‚Äôintensit√© de la maladie sont calcul√©es par placette. La fonction prepare_data() r√©alise ce calcul par d√©faut, mais vous pouvez aussi le personnaliser (voir l‚Äôaide de la fonction). Ce cas de figure intervient g√©n√©ralement quand souhaite calculer une efficacit√©. title: Calcul of efficacy according to the Abbott's formula ‚Äî efficacy
text: function calculate treatment efficacy according Abbott formula (1925). Eff = ((value_tnt - value)/value_tnt) * 100 value_tnt : percentage linving check (non treated) value : percentage living treatment Abbott formula appropriate dealing infestation levels live individuals uniform pest disease populations Efficacy level reduction target harmful organisms damage caused plant, application treatment, compared untreated control. Efficacy expressed percentage. Reference : Abbott, W.S. 1925. method computing effectiveness insecticide. J. Econ. Entomol., 18:265-267. See also : Henderson Tilton (1955) formula non-uniform populations

what: Calcul efficacy according to the Henderson and Tilton formula ‚Äî ht_efficacy
title: Calcul efficacy according to the Henderson and Tilton formula ‚Äî ht_efficacy
text: function calculate treatment efficacy according Henderson Tilton formula (1955). #' non-uniform populations, Henderson Tilton (1955) formula suited allows us judge differences population development. formula mortality ratio corrected control mortality Eff = (1 - (T_a * C_b) / (T_b * C_a)) * 100 : Tb number mites treatment Ta  number mites treatment Cb number mites treatment check plot (TNT) Ca number mites treatment check plot (TNT) Efficacy expressed percentage. Reference : Henderson, C.F. E. W. Tilton. 1955. Tests acaricides brow wheat mite, J. Econ. Entomol. 48:157-161. See also : Abbott (1925) formula
